DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness two cognitive behavioral therapy ( CBTs ) treat obsessive compulsive disorder ( OCD ) patient take medication still residual symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive Behavioral Therapy Plus Drug Treatment Obsessive Compulsive Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Participants remain current OCD medication randomly assign receive one two CBTs : exposure ritual prevention stress management therapy . Exposure ritual prevention involve imaginal in-vivo exposure require participant refrain ritualize . Stress management involve relaxation , assertiveness training , structure problem-solving . Therapy occur twice per week 2 month . Participants assess verbally independent evaluator ask complete self-rating form . Patients respond follow 1 additional year . Participants continue take medication monthly therapy first 6 month follow-up . During second 6 month follow-up , participant discontinue therapy continue take medication . For information relate study , please follow link : http : //clinicaltrials.gov/show/NCT00389493
